sentence: The Anti-Defamation League describes Fuentes as “a white supremacist leader and organizer and podcaster who seeks to forge a white nationalist alternative to the mainstream GOP.” Fuentes is the leader of the so-called Groyper Army and notably hosted Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) as a keynote speaker at a far-right conference he held last year as counter-programming to CPAC.
author: Alex Griffing
title: House Jan. 6 Committee Subpoenas Far-Right ‘Groypers’ Nick Fuentes and Patrick Casey

sentence: “‘This never would have happened with us had I been in office — not even thinkable,’ Trump said in a Tuesday radio interview, describing Putin’s recognition of Ukrainian separatist regions as ‘savvy.’” — One example of the strange new coalitions being forged on the fly: A bipartisan group of 43 lawmakers in Congress — ranging from Reps. PAUL GOSAR (R-Ariz.) to ALEXANDRIA OCASIO-CORTEZ (D-N.Y.) — is asking Biden to “seek congressional authorization before directly involving U.S. troops in the emerging Russia-Ukraine conflict,” our Anthony Adragna reports for Congress Minutes.
title: POLITICO Playbook: GOP pans Biden’s first taste of sanctions

sentence: MCCARTHY’S FRINGE PROBLEM — House Minority Leader KEVIN MCCARTHY promised to talk with Reps. MARJORIE TAYLOR GREENE (R-Ga.) and PAUL GOSAR (R-Ariz.) after they spoke at a white nationalist event, but he hasn’t done so yet, Olivia Beavers reports.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Russia escalates brutality, Congress steps up response

sentence: It took him a week to speak to Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), who had tweeted a violent video featuring Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.
author: Emily Singer
title: House Republicans Enraged By Cawthorn’s ‘Orgy’ And 'Cocaine Bump' Claims

sentence: On Friday, POLITICO reported that Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) is now blaming his video attendance of the America First Political Action Conference headed up by white nationalist Nick Fuentes as a "staffing error" — and that he had no idea who Fuentes was or what ideology the conference was promoting.
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Paul Gosar says he's 'given up' on collaborating with white nationalist who has 'a problem with his mouth'
